title: Not Allowing Me to Add New Videos to a Config File
body:
Hello! You all have been super helpful in the past and was hoping for help with these two issues on 2.2c1:

**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**
OS: Windows 10
DeepLabCut Version: DeepLabCut 2.2rc1
Anaconda env used: Anaconda3 (64bit)

**Describe the problem**

After upgrading from an older version of DeepLabCut to the newest one available by reinstalling Conda and getting the newest python for it, I tried to run dlc on my GPU which I had it previously installed on to say it is unable to load a dynamic library for it. I have an NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 TI but I'm curious as to what is happening. I can analyze videos fairly well with accuracy but I want to increase my output by resampling with new videos, however that won't work either and gives me an error. I'm confused since how is it that I have the environment made as well as can analyze videos but not add anymore to my config? Moreover, if I cannot load the library is that stunting my output from being more accurate? All other functions work so far (evaluate, analyze, refine, etc.).  Below is my code and system information with checks on my nvidia and my gpu working first:

